title: Lag issues started recently
body:
Tracing route to 104.160.141.3 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  HG [192.168.1.1]
  2     2 ms     2 ms     2 ms  37.130.68.1
  3     3 ms     5 ms     4 ms  host-213-14-86-97.reverse.superonline.net [213.14.86.97]
  4     5 ms     3 ms     3 ms  10.40.129.197
  5    13 ms    11 ms    11 ms  10.38.221.130
  6     5 ms     3 ms     3 ms  10.38.211.154
  7    12 ms    11 ms    12 ms  10.38.211.153
  8    12 ms    14 ms    15 ms  10.36.6.142
  9    12 ms    12 ms    13 ms  10.36.108.174
 10    12 ms    12 ms    13 ms  ix-ae-10-0.tcore1.IT5-Istanbul.as6453.net [5.23.0.37]
 11    55 ms    55 ms    55 ms  if-ae-8-2.tcore1.FNM-Frankfurt.as6453.net [195.219.156.21]
 12    48 ms    48 ms    48 ms  if-ae-12-2.tcore2.FNM-Frankfurt.as6453.net [195.219.87.1]
 13    55 ms    56 ms    57 ms  ffm-b1-link.telia.net [213.248.82.40]
 14    47 ms    47 ms    47 ms  ffm-bb3-link.telia.net [62.115.121.4]
 15   105 ms    53 ms    53 ms  hbg-bb1-link.telia.net [62.115.123.131]
 16    67 ms    67 ms    68 ms  adm-bb3-link.telia.net [62.115.113.250]
 17    57 ms    57 ms    58 ms  adm-b2-link.telia.net [213.155.137.195]
 18   112 ms   118 ms   111 ms  riot-ic-310541-adm-b2.c.telia.net [62.115.54.122]
 19   117 ms   117 ms   117 ms  104.160.141.3

lag nearly doubled recently. i am having the same issue in turkey server too(which is located close to euw)

replies.body: Based on this, it looks like you've got a lot of hops throughout your ISP that gets pretty bumpier as you go along.  You may need to share this with your ISP to see why some of those nodes are jumping so high, specifically with hops 11 to 17.  In the meantime, you may be able to try some steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help, especially focusing on the configuring your DNS section.  That may adjust the route you're taking and find another path.  Hope that helps!
